external_references.description: Benjamin Chang, Goutam Tripathy, Pranay Kumar Chhaparwal, Anmol Maurya & Vishwa Thothathri, Palo Alto Networks. (2024, March 22). Large-Scale StrelaStealer Campaign in Early 2024. Retrieved December 31, 2024.
Fortgale. (2023, September 18). StrelaStealer Malware Analysis. Retrieved December 31, 2024.

objects.description: [StrelaStealer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1183) payloads have used control flow obfuscation techniques such as excessively long code blocks of mathematical instructions to defeat sandboxing and related analysis methods.(Citation: PaloAlto StrelaStealer 2024)(Citation: Fortgale StrelaStealer 2023)
